excerpt.rendered: So what exactly is a Via Ferrata? In simple terms, it is a mountain route equipped with fixed ladders, cables, and bridges intended to make mountainous terrain more accessible. But AVA never did things the simple way. Read more about AVA’s Via Ferrata courses here.
